name: Lotus Exige S roadster
description: More raw than a Japanese tasting menu, the Lotus Exige S Roadster combines its coup twin's mesmerizing grunt and handling with an open air experience that makes the driver feel all the more at one with the road.</br></br>It's the first time an Exige model has been offered with a factory-fitted soft top roof, one which is typically lightweight and easy to put up and take down. In true Lotus fashion the finely tuned suspension delivers a responsive ride and sublimely agile handling, whilst the supercharged 3.5 V6 engine with race-derived technologies delivers stunning performance.
